lines: Me chest... <wheeze> Is this my fate? To die in this dusty hellhole?

Even if he can deliver on his promises, I doubt I'll live to see it. But...by Rhalgr, what I wouldn't give to fight alongside them─to look into the eyes of an imperial as the light fades from his eyes...one last time...
On my good days, I've been able to help out Alfan with his work. He's been making medicine to send to those putting their lives on the line for Ala Mhigo.
Me chest is burning...<wheeze>...with the fire that inspired my brethren to take back our home. Ugh, I feel like I'm dying, but I couldn't be happier.

obj.n: サボテンダーは希望の雫
